name: Pulcra Vermis:Re
description:
A FIRST-PERSON HORROR, PUZZLE AND EXPLORATION GAME.

//Story

In the game, an unfortunate adventurer finds himself trapped in a strange dimension in which stands a colossal castle, inside, in order to leave he has to resolve multiple puzzles while deciding whether to listen or not to a mysterious voice in his head. 

//Features

  • Secret entrances
  • 3 endings
  • Soft horror

//Controls

Q - Drop items.

E or Left Mouse Button - Pick up items.

Scroll Middle Mouse Button - Inventory.
